item.title: What is the frame for fletching?
item.dc:creator: @MisterZ MisterZ
item.description:
@MisterZ wrote:

umm no lemme explain myself :p. The frame I’m talking about is the frame that appears when you choose which bow to make. On my server I have it set to the quest interface which is just like choosing options in a quest but instead your making bows. I don’t want that frame I’m looking for the frame that has the picture of the bow halves and you click either one and get that bow halve…

Read full topic

item.title: What is the frame for fletching?
item.dc:creator: @MisterZ MisterZ
item.description:
@MisterZ wrote:

I made a fletching skill but I have no clue what the frame for fletching is. I use the quest interface to determine what type of bow you want to make but that is ghetto. Does anyone know what frame it is for example I use these for which bow to choose in the quest interface frame.

sendFrame126(name + " Short Bow", 2461); sendFrame126(name + " Long Bow", 2462);

Read full topic
